options.expr:
CASE
         WHEN stav=1 AND je_diskuse THEN 2
         WHEN stav=1 AND cas_bg!='0000-00-00' AND cas_ok='0000-00-00' THEN 1
         WHEN stav=1 AND cas_ok!='0000-00-00' THEN 3
         WHEN stav=2 THEN 4
         WHEN stav=3 THEN 5
         ELSE 0 END
